name: Shared Attunment
summary: When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself.
description:
When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself. This has no effect if the terrain attunement affects your foes instead of granting you a benefit.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
